name: Guy Saves His Marriage!
description:
The result of the GMTK 2021 Game Jam (theme of "Joined Together"). We focused our design on levels that are dependent on one another, eventually joining them together into one elaborate puzzle.

Overview:

This is a short platforming puzzle game about maintaining speed through levels. At the end of each level, the speed at which the level was ended is carried over to other levels in the form of "Rifts", which apply said speed when touched.

Return to previous levels to get the speed you need to beat the current one(s)!

Total of 7 levels that all serve a purpose more than once.

Credits:

Julian Abraham - Programmer and level designer

Colin Martin - Artist and musician
